roleset.name: reach a maximum

example.name: peak at
example.text: The drama in Yugoslavia seemed to climax last Thursday when hundreds of thousands of protesters forced the ouster of Slobodan Milosevic , but now the events of last week are beginning to look like act 1 .

propbank.arg: last Thursday when hundreds of thousands of protesters forced the ouster of Slobodan Milosevic

example.name: arg 1
example.text: a pathetic climax to his more than four decades either in government or on its threshold

propbank.arg: to his more than four decades either in government or on its threshold

roleset.note: CLIMAX-V NOTES: frame by Perryn (from climax.01-v)
CLIMAX-N NOTES: Based on ontonotes nouns. Comparison to climax.01-v. No VN or FN classes. Framed by Katie. (from climax.01-n)
